title: CreditLimitTypeEnum
description: The enumeration values to qualify the type of credit limits.

oneOf.title: CS01
oneOf.description: The type of credit line expressed in CS01. The sensitivity with respect to changes in the CDS spread.

oneOf.title: DV01
oneOf.description: The type of credit line expressed in DV01. The dollar value of a one basis point decrease in interest rates. It shows the change in a bond's price compared to a decrease in the bond's yield.

oneOf.title: IM
oneOf.description: The type of credit line expressed in Initial Margin value.

oneOf.title: NPV
oneOf.description: The type of credit line expressed as a Net Present Value.

oneOf.title: Notional
oneOf.description: The type of credit line expressed in Notional amount.

oneOf.title: PV01
oneOf.description: The type of credit line expressed in PV01. The value of a one dollar or one basis point annuity.
